column4: Hello everyone, When my daugther messed with my computer, she seem to have disabled the applications at startup (nm-applet for example...) Any help to re-enable it please?
Sounds like no applications defined in gnome-applications-properties is starting up
Now you know why she should have her own non-sudo-enabled-account on your computer. ;)
Well, she certainly used some keyboard shortcut... I dunno, she's 2 years and half...
